languages.text: {n}Мутанту причиняет боль даже попытка заговорить, но он превозмогает страдание и выдавливает из себя:{/n} "Пощады... остановите... остановите это..."
{n}Even attempting to speak causes the mutant pain, but he bears the agony and forces out the words:{/n} "Mercy... Make... make it stop..."
languages.original_text: {n}Мутанту причиняет боль даже попытка заговорить, но он превозмогает страдание и выдавливает из себя:{/n} "Пощады... остановите... остановите это..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Even attempting to speak causes the mutant pain, but he bears the agony and forces out the words:{/n} "Mercy... Make... make it stop..."
{n}Even attempting to speak causes the mutant pain, but he bears the agony and forces out the words:{/n} "Mercy... Make... make it stop..."
{n}Even attempting to speak causes the mutant pain, but he bears the agony and forces out the words:{/n} "Mercy... Make... make it stop..."
{n}Even attempting to speak causes the mutant pain, but he bears the agony and forces out the words:{/n} "Mercy... Make... make it stop..."

languages.text: {n}仅仅是试着说话，都会让这座肉山感到痛苦。但他硬是忍住了痛苦，强行吐出了这些话：{/n}“求求你……让它……停下来……”
languages.original_text: {n}Even attempting to speak causes the mutant pain, but he bears the agony and forces out the words:{/n} "Mercy... Make... make it stop..."

traits.locale_text: {n}仅仅是试着说话，都会让这座肉山感到痛苦。但他硬是忍住了痛苦，强行吐出了这些话：{/n}“求求你……让它……停下来……”

languages.text: {n}El mero intento de hablar hace sufrir al mutante, que soporta la agonía y logra pronunciarse:{/n} «Piedad... Haced... que pare...».
languages.original_text: {n}Even attempting to speak causes the mutant pain, but he bears the agony and forces out the words:{/n} "Mercy... Make... make it stop..."

traits.locale_text: {n}El mero intento de hablar hace sufrir al mutante, que soporta la agonía y logra pronunciarse:{/n} «Piedad... Haced... que pare...».

languages.text: {n}言葉を発しようとする変異体には苦痛が伴うようだ。それでも彼は言葉を振り絞る。{/n}「慈悲を…どうか…止めて…」
languages.original_text: {n}Even attempting to speak causes the mutant pain, but he bears the agony and forces out the words:{/n} "Mercy... Make... make it stop..."

traits.locale_text: {n}言葉を発しようとする変異体には苦痛が伴うようだ。それでも彼は言葉を振り絞る。{/n}「慈悲を…どうか…止めて…」

languages.text: {n}Schon der Versuch, zu sprechen, bereitet dem Mutanten Schmerzen, aber er erträgt die Agonie und zwingt einige Worte heraus:{/n} "Gnade ... Macht ... das es aufhört ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Even attempting to speak causes the mutant pain, but he bears the agony and forces out the words:{/n} "Mercy... Make... make it stop..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Schon der Versuch, zu sprechen, bereitet dem Mutanten Schmerzen, aber er erträgt die Agonie und zwingt einige Worte heraus:{/n} "Gnade ... Macht ... das es aufhört ..."

languages.text: {n}Bien que chaque mot fasse souffrir le mutant, il endure la douleur et se force à continuer :{/n} « Pitié... Mettez fin... à cette torture... »
languages.original_text: {n}Even attempting to speak causes the mutant pain, but he bears the agony and forces out the words:{/n} "Mercy... Make... make it stop..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bien que chaque mot fasse souffrir le mutant, il endure la douleur et se force à continuer :{/n} « Pitié... Mettez fin... à cette torture... »

languages.text: {n}Konuşmaya çalışmak dahi mutantın acı çekmesine yol açıyor. Ancak acıya göğüs gerip birkaç kelime sarf ediyor.{/n} "İnsaf... Ne olur... Durdur..."
languages.original_text: {n}Even attempting to speak causes the mutant pain, but he bears the agony and forces out the words:{/n} "Mercy... Make... make it stop..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Konuşmaya çalışmak dahi mutantın acı çekmesine yol açıyor. Ancak acıya göğüs gerip şu kelimeleri sarf ediyor:{/n} “İnsaf... Ne olur... Durdur...”
